sqlMap.select:
Select * From s_sys_privilege
uuid=#uuid# is_ajax=#is_ajax# privilege_name like CONCAT('%',#privilege_name#,'%')
Order By PRIVILEGE_TYPE,MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_privilege Set privilege_name=#privilege_name#, parent_privilege=#parent_privilege#, descriptions=#descriptions#, privilege_id=#privilege_id#, privilege_type=#privilege_type#, is_ajax=#is_ajax#, ajax_map_id=#ajax_map_id#, is_menu=#is_menu#, menu_url=#menu_url#, menu_target=#menu_target#, menu_priority=#menu_priority#, menu_title=#menu_title#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, module=#module# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
Select * From s_sys_role Where role_type=1
uuid=#uuid#
uuid In #roles[]#
ORDER BY role_name

Select * From s_sys_role Where role_type=0
uuid=#uuid#
uuid In #roles[]#
ORDER BY role_rank
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_role Set role_name=#role_name#, role_type=#role_type#, role_rank=#role_rank#, descriptions=#descriptions#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
Select p.privilege_id,p.parent_privilege,p.privilege_name From s_sys_privilege p WHERE p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 1
Order By p.MENU_PRIORITY,p.LM_TIME
Select p.privilege_id,p.parent_privilege,p.privilege_name From s_sys_privilege p WHERE p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 0

SELECT r.uuid, p.privilege_name, p.parent_privilege, r.role_id, p.privilege_id, r.type, r.function, l.role_name FROM s_sys_role l, s_sys_roleprvg r LEFT JOIN s_sys_privilege p ON p.privilege_id = r.privilege_id WHERE r.role_id = l.uuid
r.uuid=#uuid# role_id=#role_id#
role_id In #roles[]#
Order By l.UUID,p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE,p.MENU_PRIORITY
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_roleprvg r Set r.type = #type#, r.function = #function# Where r.role_id = #role_id# And r.privilege_id = #privilege_id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from s_sys_roleprvg where 1=1
role_id = #role_id# privilege_id=#privilege_id#
sqlMap.select:
Select * From s_sys_department Where 1=1
uuid=#uuid# type=#type# dept_code=#dept_code#
dept_code In #dept_codes[]#
dept_code Like CONCAT(#check_code#,'%') ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

Select dept_code From s_sys_department
uuid=#uuid# dept_code Like #dept_code# parent_dept = #parent_dept#
ORDER BY DEPT_CODE
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_department Set dept_code=#dept_code#, parent_dept=#parent_dept#, dept_ename=#dept_ename#, dept_cname=#dept_cname#, descriptions=#descriptions#, type=#type#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT u.uuid,u.*,r.ROLE_NAME TYPE_NAME,d.DEPT_CNAME,u2.USER_NAME AS senior_name,p.POSITION_NAME FROM s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (u.dept_code = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u2 ON (u.SENIOR = u2.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_role r ON (u.USER_TYPE = r.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p ON (u.POSITION = p.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_userdept ud ON(ud.`user_id`=u.`UUID`) Where 1=1
u.uuid=#uuid# u.title=#title# u.user_name like #user_name# u.email like #email# u.mobile like #mobile# u.status=#status#
ud.`dept_code`=#dept_code# ud.`dept_code` LIKE CONCAT(#dept_code#,'%')
ud.`dept_code` in ($dept_codeds$)
ud.`dept_code` In #apply_perdepts[]# u.uuid=#apply_userDouble#
u.position In #positions[]#
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_user Set ukeys=#ukeys#, dept_code=#dept_code#, user_roles=#user_roles#, user_type=#user_type#, extra_prvg=#extra_prvg#, work_id=#work_id#, user_name=#user_name#, sex=#sex#, email=#email#, phone=#phone#, mobile=#mobile#, position=#position#, descriptions=#descriptions#, status=#status#, filesystem_root=#filesystem_root#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update s_sys_user Set dept_code=#dept_code# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update s_sys_user Set user_name=#user_name#, sex=#sex#, email=#email#, phone=#phone#, mobile=#mobile#, descriptions=#descriptions#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where title=#title#
Update s_sys_user Set user_sign=#user_sign# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update s_sys_user Set passwords=#passwords#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT u.*,d.DEPT_CNAME,u2.USER_NAME AS senior_name FROM s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (u.dept_code = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u2 ON (u.SENIOR = u2.UUID)
(u.TITLE = #title# OR u.MOBILE = #title#) u.`STATUS` = #status#

SELECT Count(*) FROM s_sys_user u
u.TITLE = #title# u.mobile = #mobile# u.email = #email#

Select * From s_cfg_position
uuid=#uuid# position_name Like CONCAT('%',#position_name#,'%')
ORDER BY POSITION_GRADE
sqlMap.update: Update s_cfg_position p Set position_name = #position_name#, position_senior=#position_senior#, position_grade = #position_grade#, position_attribute = #position_attribute#, position_note = #position_note#, lm_user = #lm_user#, lm_time = #lm_time# Where uuid = #uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT UUID,PRIVILEGE_ID,PRIVILEGE_NAME,PARENT_PRIVILEGE,MENU_URL,MENU_TARGET,MENU_TITLE,module,MENU_PRIORITY FROM s_sys_privilege Where is_menu = 1 And PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 1
privilege_id In #user_permits[]#
Order By MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME

SELECT UUID,PRIVILEGE_ID,PRIVILEGE_NAME,PARENT_PRIVILEGE,MENU_URL,MENU_TARGET,MENU_TITLE,module FROM s_sys_privilege Where is_menu = 1 And PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 0
privilege_id In #user_permits[]#
Order By MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME

SELECT ud.*,d.`dept_cname` dept_cname,p.`POSITION_NAME` position_name FROM s_sys_userdept ud LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (ud.`dept_code`=d.`dept_code`) LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p ON (ud.`position` = p.UUID)
ud.uuid=#uuid# ud.user_id=#user_id#
ORDER BY uuid
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_userdept p Set dept_code = #dept_code#, position=#position#, depsubover=#depsubover#, subover = #subover#, roles = #roles#, prvgs = #prvgs#, lm_time = #lm_time# Where uuid = #uuid#
